member.summary: Container class for Instance's terrain-related members

member.name: M:VP.Instance.Wait(System.Int32)
member.summary: Pumps incoming events, fires any registered events or callbacks, then sleeps for the given amount of milliseconds.

member.summary: Logs into a specified universe with the given authentication details and bot name. Chainable.

member.summary: Logs into the default Virtual Paradise universe with the given authentication details and initialized bot name. Chainable.

member.summary: Enters a given world, chainable

member.name: M:VP.Native.Utf8StringToManaged.CleanUpNativeData(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Do nothing, for some reason CleanUpNativeData is called for pointers that are not even created by the marshaler. This can cause heap corruption because of double free or because a different allocater may have been used to allocate the memory block.
